history.title: Our Story
history.intro: ChallengeTies is more than just an app. It's a human journey‚Äîan invitation to grow, connect, and transform your daily habits into shared, positive adventures. Whether you're solo or with a friend, every completed challenge is a win, every effort counts, and each day becomes a new opportunity to rise.

specialChallenges.title: Special Challenges
specialChallenges.desc: A variety of challenges, fun or deep, that you can take on alone or with a friend. Choose your duration and discover a pressure-free way to level up.

progressTracking.title: Progress Tracking
progressTracking.desc: Track your consistency, unlock trophies, see your growth over time, and feel proud of your dedication.

customChallenges.title: Custom Challenges
customChallenges.desc: Create challenges tailored to your life, your goals, your rhythm. Everyone grows differently‚Äîand that's beautiful.

community.title: Strong Community
community.desc: Join a positive and supportive network. Submit ideas, vote for new features, share your journey, and grow together.

history.motivation: Because we were tired of cold, lonely, or guilt-driven apps. We wanted something human. Something fun. A place where every small win is celebrated. Where progress is personal and support is constant. ChallengeTies was born to help people grow‚Äîwith no pressure and a lot of heart.
history.logoMeaning: The central ‚ÄúT‚Äù stands for Ties‚Äîthe connection. The galactic energy surrounding it represents momentum, growth, and unity. It‚Äôs a spark in the universe, the moment you decide to change. A symbol that‚Äôs simple, powerful, and universal.
history.vision: We don‚Äôt just want an app. We want a whole ecosystem of positive tools. ChallengeTies, SkillTies, MindTies and more. A connected universe of well-being, learning, and growth‚Äîwhere kindness, humor, and simplicity rule.
history.beginnings: It all began in a camper van, between the mountains and code, between dreams and reality. The idea: what if an app could really help people turn intentions into lasting actions? Not to be perfect. But to be better. Together. One challenge at a time.
history.communityEngagement: ChallengeTies isn‚Äôt our app. It‚Äôs yours. Users propose ideas, vote, and help shape the future. This is a living project‚Äîbuilt with and for the people who believe in it.
history.finalThanksMessage: If you‚Äôre reading this, it means you believe in this project. From the bottom of our hearts‚Äîthank you. ChallengeTies exists because of people like you: curious, kind, and driven. Let‚Äôs keep rising. Together. üöÄ

challengeAlimentationConsciente.miniCours: Mindful eating üçΩÔ∏è is a process that involves savoring every bite ü•£, taking time to appreciate the flavors, textures, and aromas of food üçí, and becoming aware of the satisfaction and fullness they bring üëå. It can help you balance your diet, avoid cravings, and eat healthier ü•¶. To do this, eliminate all distractions (TV, phone, reading) during meals üö´üì∫üì±üìñ, listen to your body image and be aware of hunger and satiety cues üîé.
exemples: Example 1 ‚ú®: Prepare a simple and healthy meal, then sit down without distractions. Focus on each bite, savoring the flavors and textures.
Example 2 üí°: When you crave a snack, ask yourself if you're truly hungry or just on autopilot.

challengeDes3Sourires.miniCours: The art of smiling may seem basic, but a genuine smile can truly brighten someone‚Äôs day! üòä Every day, challenge yourself to give a smile to three different people. It could be in a caf√©, on the street, or even in the mirror! Not only does it spread joy, but it also benefits you by releasing endorphins that make you feel happier. Try to give smiles from the heart, not forced ones. Authenticity is key! üëç
exemples: Example 1 ‚ú®: While ordering your morning coffee, smile at the barista and say thank you.

challengeGestionTemps.miniCours: Time management is crucial for productivity and goal-setting. üòÉ A widely used method is the Pomodoro Technique üçÖ: work intensely for 25 minutes, then take a 5-minute break. Repeat this four times, and after the fourth cycle take a longer 15‚Äì20 minute break. This prevents mental fatigue and keeps you focused. üí™ Give your day clear structure, respect your rhythm, and make every minute count‚Äîyour goals will feel far more attainable. üöÄ
exemples: Example 1 ‚ú®: Draft an important work report by breaking it into 25-minute Pomodoro segments with short breaks.
Example 2 üí°: Learn a new language using focused Pomodoro study sessions, with breaks to consolidate what you‚Äôve learned.
Example 3 üöÄ: Apply the technique to creative work‚Äîpainting, writing, music‚Äîto slip into that coveted ‚Äòflow‚Äô state.
Example 4 üå±: Use Pomodoro breaks for self-care: hydrate, stretch, or simply clear your mind.

ressources.title: How to Use the Pomodoro Technique

challengeJeuneIntermittent.miniCours: üåû Intermittent fasting is like giving your digestive system a break ‚è∏Ô∏è‚Äîeat within a specific window (e.g., 8 hours) and fast the remaining 16 üåõ. This approach can boost metabolism üöÄ, sharpen focus and mental clarity üéØ, and may even support longevity üåü. No need to deprive yourself of nourishing foods üåà, just adjust meal times. Important ‚ùóÔ∏è Always consult a healthcare professional before starting ü©∫üìù.
exemples: Example 1 ‚ú®: Follow a 12 pm‚Äì8 pm eating window and fast from 8 pm to 12 pm the next day.
Example 2 üí°: Schedule workouts during your eating period for optimal energy.
Example 3 üöÄ: Drink plenty of water while fasting to stay hydrated.
Example 4 üå±: Avoid processed foods; focus on whole foods during meals.

challengeLectureSurprise.miniCours: Shake up your routine by investing a little time each day in reading üìö. Diving into new literary perspectives not only enriches your vocabulary but also sparks creativity üé® and empathy. Picking a random book exposes you to ideas and experiences far removed from your own. Turn it into a game üé≤‚Äîa literary lottery where every day is a winning ticket to a fresh intellectual adventure. Remember, this isn‚Äôt a race but a peaceful exploration üö∂‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è. Enjoy the journey!
exemples: Example 1 ‚ú®: In a bookstore or library, close your eyes, reach for a random book, open it, and begin your journey.
